name: Civic Project Night
description:
• What we'll do
Project night! We'll gather together to collaborate, learn, and work to improve our community. There's a need for a wide variety of skill sets, so no matter your where your experience lies or how much of it you've got, join us! All you need is a desire to roll your sleeves up, learn, and get something done.

Projects!
These are active projects that need your help! Hop in and give us a hand.

- Contributing to City Bureau City-Scraper Project. This open source project is meant to help catalog and store public meetings. Link: https://github.com/City-Bureau/city-scrapers

- Fixing our website: Our static GitHub pages site needs some work (http://openuptown.us). There are some items in the issues section on GitHub we need to address (https://github.com/Open-Uptown/Code-and-Coffee-Uptown-Brigade.github.io/issues), but we could also weigh our options on the best way to address it (modifying vs rewriting vs etc). We need your help!

Pipeline!
These are items we're in the planning or relationship building phases for. The source of these are folks in our community who we're engaging with to work side by side as partners toward the development of potential projects.

- Working with DoIT (City of Chicago) to improve the accessibility of their web properties for folks of all abilities.

- Investigating possibility of Courtbot implementation

- Linking up with Library innovation leadership on some needs they have (more to come)

Education!
- If you'd like to volunteer to share a skill pop a line to ryan@openuptown.us and we'll get it posted here. Or just show up and say 'hey I want to share this cool thing I know.'

Agenda:
- Meet and greet
- Speaker (if one is scheduled)
- Project pitches (If there are any)
- Get into our project groups and hop right to it!

• What to bring
Your awesome ideas and a laptop if you fancy.

• Important to know
Code of Conduct: https://github.com/Code-and-Coffee-Uptown-Brigade/codeofconduct/blob/master/README.md
------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------
This meetup is hosted with lots of love for our community. We depend on the members we serve to continue engaging Uptown & Chicago with regular, civic technology meetups! Please make a tax deductible donation to Open Uptown (via Code for America) if you believe in what we're doing.
------------------------------------------------
https://secure.codeforamerica.org/page/contribute/default?source_codes=Brigade-page&brigade=Open%20Uptown
------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------
how_to_find_us: The door autolocks, so one of us will let you in. Feel free to knock or use the door bell if we're too slow.

name: Code & Coffee
description:
Open Uptown's originally formed in Chicago as "Code & Coffee: Uptown Brigade." Our signature event involves code, co-working, and coffee every Thursday morning at Emerald City. Bring a laptop and come hang with your neighbors.

• Join us on Slack (https://uptown-codes.herokuapp.com).

• Bring your own projects to work on or share.

• Work on one of our projects (build us a Twitter bot or improve our website).

• Learn about Civic Technology project night, our other event.

• C8H10N4O2 with your friends.
------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------
This meetup is hosted with lots of love for our community. We depend on the members we serve to continue engaging Uptown & Chicago with regular, civic technology meetups! Please make a tax deductible donation to Open Uptown (via Code for America) if you believe in what we're doing.
------------------------------------------------
https://secure.codeforamerica.org/page/contribute/default?source_codes=Brigade-page&brigade=Open%20Uptown
------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------
